data.title: SmarTone Telecommunications Holdings Ltd
data.meta_description: Verified and credible SmarTone Telecommunications Holdings Ltd company overview, qualified supplier, trader, manufacturer, vendor, distributor providing products and services on HKTDC Sourcing
data.text:
SmarTone is a leading telecommunications company with operating subsidiaries in Hong Kong and Macau. It provides voice, multimedia and mobile broadband services through its territory-wide 4G and 3G HSPA+ networks, as well as fixed fibre broadband services for the consumer and corporate markets.
